snippet.title: Auto Adventures early access gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
First gameplay trailer for my new game Auto Adventures, set for early access release on Steam Feb 18th.

Auto Adventures is an asynchronous PvP auto-battler inspired by Tempo Storm's game "The Bazaar". Follow us on our social media pages to learn more about the game!
